Now God governs us by Christ: we ought therefore to do all things relying upon the grace and assistance of Christ the Mediator.

This likewise is evident, That all our good actions must be referred to the glory of Christ. For if they are done with any other end, although they may seem good as to the externa! appearance, yet they become bad on account of the perverse intent: For the end determines the quality in morals, say the schoolmen.
